title: Leaving Customs
body:
So I was playing a custom of Hide and Seek today, and had a couple of kids who found it funny to keep pausing. The other team was afk, so they couldn't surrender, and we didn't have enough saying yes on our team. I left, because I was just wasting time on a pause screen. But, apparently you have to reconnect to custom games?

Why is this a feature? It seems pretty silly to me to be honest, it's not like leaving a CUSTOM GAME will set back your team or anything. I got stuck like this for a long time, and I went and did other things, but I couldn't play LoL.

TL;DR: Riot, please allow us to leave customs games. Thank you.
